    • Uses of Square in edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello

      Methods in edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello that return Square 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Square OthelloPlayer.getCurrentBestMove()
      Returns The best move that the agent has found so far, as registered using OthelloPlayer.registerCurrentBestMove(Square).
      Square InvalidMoveException.getMove()
      Returns the offending move.
      abstract Square OthelloPlayer.getMove(GameState currentState, java.util.Date deadline)
      Returns the move chosen by this player given the current game state.
      Square RandomOthelloPlayer.getMove(GameState currentState, java.util.Date deadline)
      Returns a random, valid move from currentState.
      Square HumanOthelloPlayer.getMove(GameState currentState, java.util.Date deadline)
      Returns the next move as input by the human from the UI.
      Square GameState.getPreviousMove()
      Returns the previous move that was used to get to this state (or null if this is the initial state).
      Methods in edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello that return types with arguments of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.AbstractSet<Square> GameState.getValidMoves()
      Returns all valid Moves that may be taken from this state.
      java.util.AbstractSet<Square> GameState.getValidMoves(GameState.Player player)
      Returns all valid Moves that may be taken by player from this state.
      Methods in edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello with parameters of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameState GameState.applyMove(Square move)
      Equivalent to applyMove(move, true).
      GameState GameState.applyMove(Square move, boolean includePreviousStateReference)
      Returns the GameState resulting from applying the given move to this state.
      GameState.Player GameState.getSquare(Square square)
      Returns the player that currently owns the given square.
      void HumanOthelloPlayer.handleUIInput(Square square)
      Callback function for receiving the next move from the UI.
      boolean GameState.isLegalMove(Square move, GameState.Player player)
      Returns true if and only if move is legal for player.
      protected void OthelloPlayer.registerCurrentBestMove(Square bestMove)
      Register's the best move the agent has found so far in its search.
      Constructors in edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello with parameters of type Square 
      Constructor and Description
      InvalidMoveException(Square move, GameState.Player player, java.lang.String message)
      Constructs an InvalidMoveException with the offending move, the player that attempted the invalid move, and a message explaining why the move was invalid.
